participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and practical, enjoys outdoor activities and values health.
participant_1.background: I enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. I do not drink alcohol. My father was a construction worker. I hate the color pink. I am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves dolls and has a vivid imagination.
participant_2.background: I like to play with my dolls. I'm four. I do not pick up my toys. My best friend lives next door.

content.text: I am a mom who likes to bike and bike. Do you not drink alcohol?
I am a huge fan of all types of things. Do you hate the color pink?
